metadata.author: Prismatica Labs
metadata.notes: Mental Model: Incentives Alignment - Free article on our approach

athenaPrompt: Want to explore incentives thinking? Chat?

body.text: Sales says they want better leads. What they optimize for is easy closes. Product says they want user feedback. What they optimize for is no complaints. Executives say they want innovation. What they optimize for is no surprises. Watch what they do, not what they say. Incentives reveal truth.
